name: ArtLayer

properties.name: typename
properties.description: The class name of the object.

properties.name: fillOpacity
properties.description: The interior opacity of the layer. Range: 0.0 to 100.0.

properties.name: layerMaskDensity
properties.description: The density of the layer mask (between 0.0 and 100.0)

properties.name: layerMaskFeather
properties.description: The feather of the layer mask (between 0.0 and 250.0)

properties.name: vectorMaskDensity
properties.description: The density of the vector mask (between 0.0 and 100.0)

properties.name: vectorMaskFeather
properties.description: The feather of the vector mask (between 0.0 and 250.0)

properties.name: filterMaskDensity
properties.description: The density of the filter mask (between 0.0 and 100.0)

properties.name: filterMaskFeather
properties.description: The feather of the filter mask (between 0.0 and 250.0)

properties.name: grouped
properties.description: If true, the layer is grouped with the layer below.

properties.name: isBackgroundLayer
properties.description: If true, the layer is a background layer.

properties.name: pixelsLocked
properties.description: If true, the pixels in the layer's image cannot be edited.

properties.name: positionLocked
properties.description: If true, the pixels in the layer's image cannot be moved within the layer.

properties.name: transparentPixelsLocked
properties.description: If true, editing is confined to the opaque portions of the layer.

properties.name: kind
properties.description: Sets the layer kind (such as 'text layer') for an empty layer. Valid only when the layer is empty and when 'is background layer ' is false. You can use the 'kind ' property to make a background layer a normal layer; however, to make a layer a background layer, you must set 'is background layer' to true.

properties.name: textItem
properties.description: The text that is associated with the layer. Valid only when 'kind' is text layer.

methods.name: applyStyle

parameters.name: styleName
parameters.description: The layer style to apply.

methods.description: Applies the specified style to the layer.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Style file to apply.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: File to save the style to.

parameters.name: thumbnail
parameters.description: File to save the style thumbnail to.

parameters.name: thumbnailSize
parameters.description: Size of thumbnail to save.

parameters.name: backgroundValue
parameters.description: Background grayvalue.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Cuts the layer without moving it to the clipboard.

methods.name: copy

parameters.name: merge
parameters.description: If true, the copy includes all visible layers. If false, the copy only copies from the current layer.

methods.description: Copies the layer to the clipboard.

methods.name: cut
methods.description: Cuts the layer to the clipboard.

methods.name: merge
methods.description: Merges the layer down, removing the layer from the document. Returns a reference to the art layer that this layer is merged into.

methods.name: rasterize

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: What to rasterize.

methods.description: Converts the targeted content in the layer into a flat, raster image.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The blur width in pixels. Range: 1.0 to 250.0.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The source for the depth map.

parameters.name: focalDistance
parameters.description: The blur focal distance (in pixels) for the depth map. RangeL 0 to 255. Valid only when 'source' is transparency or layer mask.

parameters.name: invertDepthMap
parameters.description: If true, inverts the depth map.

parameters.name: shape
parameters.description: The shape of the iris.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The radius of the iris. Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: bladeCurvature
parameters.description: The blade curvature of the iris. Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: rotation
parameters.description: The rotation of the iris (in degrees). Range: 0 to 360.

parameters.name: brightness
parameters.description: The brightness for the specular highlights. Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: The threshold for the specular highlights. Range: 0 to 255.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of noise. Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: distribution
parameters.description: The distribution value for the noise.

parameters.name: monochromatic
parameters.description: If true, the noise is monochromatic.

parameters.name: angle
parameters.description: The angle (in degrees). Range: -360 to 360.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The radius (in pixels). Range: 1 to 999.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of blur. Range: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: blurMethod
parameters.description: The blur method to use.

parameters.name: blurQuality
parameters.description: The smoothness or graininess of the blurred image.

parameters.name: blurCenter
parameters.description: Position (unit value)

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The blur radius. Range: 0 - 1000.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: The blur threshold. Range: 0 - 1000.

parameters.name: blurQuality
parameters.description: The smoothness or graininess of the blurred image.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The smart blur mode.

parameters.name: graininess
parameters.description: The amount of graininess. Range: 0 to 10.

parameters.name: glowAmount
parameters.description: The glow amount. Range: 0 to 20.

parameters.name: clearAmount
parameters.description: The clear amount. Range: 0 to 20.

parameters.name: horizontalScale
parameters.description: The amount of horizontal distortion. Range: -999 to 999.

parameters.name: verticalScale
parameters.description: The amount of vertical distortion. Range: -999 to 999.

parameters.name: displacementType
parameters.description: The displacement type.

parameters.name: undefinedAreas
parameters.description: The treatment of undistorted areas.

parameters.name: displacementMapFile
parameters.description: The distortion image map.

parameters.name: distortion
parameters.description: The amount of distortion. Range: 0 to 20.

parameters.name: smoothness
parameters.description: The smoothness. Range: 1 to 15.

parameters.name: scaling
parameters.description: The amount of scaling. Range: 50 to 200.

parameters.name: invert
parameters.description: If true, the texture is inverted.

parameters.name: texture
parameters.description: The type of texture.

parameters.name: textureFile
parameters.description: The file from which to load the texture type.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The ripple size. Range: 1 to 15.

parameters.name: magnitude
parameters.description: The ripple magnitude. Range: 0 to 20.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The pinch amount. Range: -100 to 100.

parameters.name: conversion
parameters.description: The conversion type.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The ripple amount. Range: -999 to 999.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The ripple size.

parameters.name: curve
parameters.description: Specification of the shear curve in points as x,y coordinate pairs in the format [[x1, y1],[x2, y2]]. Any number of coordinate pairs can be specified.

parameters.name: undefinedAreas
parameters.description: The treatment of areas left blank by the distortion.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of distortion. Range: -100 to 100.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The distortion mode.

parameters.name: angle
parameters.description: The twirl angle. Range: -999 to 999.

parameters.name: generatorNumber
parameters.description: The number of generators. Range: 1 to 999.

parameters.name: minimumWavelength
parameters.description: The minimum wave length. Range: 1 to 998.

parameters.name: maximumWavelength
parameters.description: The maximum wave length. Range: 2 to (minimum wavelength + 1)

parameters.name: minimumAmplitude
parameters.description: The minimum amplitude. Range: 1 to 998.

parameters.name: maximumAmplitude
parameters.description: The maximum amplitude. Range: 2 to (minimum amplitude + 1)

parameters.name: horizontalScale
parameters.description: The amount of horizontal scale (as a percentage). Range: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: verticalScale
parameters.description: The amount of vertical scale (as a percentage). Range: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: waveType
parameters.description: The wave type.

parameters.name: undefinedAreas
parameters.description: The treatment of areas left blank by the distortion.

parameters.name: randomSeed
parameters.description: The random seed.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of zigzag. Range: -100 to 100.

parameters.name: ridges
parameters.description: The ridge length.

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: The zigzag style.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of noise (as a percentage). Range: 0.1 to 400.0.

parameters.name: distribution
parameters.description: The noise distribution type.

parameters.name: monochromatic
parameters.description: If true, applies the filter only to the tonal elements in the image without changing the colors.

methods.name: applyDustAndScratches

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The size (in pixels) of the area searched for dissimilar pixels. Range: 1 to 16.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Determines how dissimilar the pixels should be before they are eliminated. Range: 0 to 255.

methods.description: Applies the dust and scratches filter.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The size of the area searched for pixels of similar brightness. Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: brightness
parameters.description: The flare brightness. Range: 10 to 300.

parameters.name: flareCenter
parameters.description: The position of the flare center.

parameters.name: lensType
parameters.description: The lens type.

parameters.name: textureFile
parameters.description: The texture file. Must be a grayscale Photoshop file.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of sharpening (as a percentage). Range: 1 to 500.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The radius in pixels. Range: 0.1 to 250.0.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: The contrast threshold. Range: 0 to 255.

parameters.name: eliminateFields
parameters.description: The fields to eliminate.

parameters.name: createFields
parameters.description: The method to use to replace eliminated fields.

parameters.name: characteristics
parameters.description: The custom filter characteristics. This is an array of 25 values that corresponds to a left-to-right, top-to- bottom traversal of the array presented in the Custom dialog in the user interface (Filter > Other > Custom).

parameters.name: scale
parameters.description: The value by which to divide the sum of the brightness values of the pixels included in the calculation.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The value to be added to the result of the scale calculation.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The width (in pixels) of the radius where edge details are retained.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The choke area (in pixels). Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The spread area (in pixels). Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: horizontal
parameters.description: The amount (in pixels) to move the selection horizontally (to the right). Range: -6144 to 6144.

parameters.name: vertical
parameters.description: The amount (in pixels) to move the selection vertically (downward). Range: -6144 to 6144.

parameters.name: undefinedAreas
parameters.description: The method for filling areas left blank by the offset.

methods.name: adjustLevels

parameters.name: inputRangeStart
parameters.description: The input levels minimum. Range: 0 to 253.

parameters.name: inputRangeEnd
parameters.description: The input levels maximum. Range: (input range start + 2) to 253.

parameters.name: inputRangeGamma
parameters.description: The input levels gamma. Range: 0.10 to 9.99.

parameters.name: outputRangeStart
parameters.description: The output levels minimum. Range: 0 to 253.

parameters.name: outputRangeEnd
parameters.description: The output levels maximum. Range: (output range start + 2) to 253.

methods.description: Adjusts levels of the selected channels.

methods.name: autoLevels
methods.description: Adjust the levels of the selected channels using the auto levels option.

methods.name: autoContrast
methods.description: Adjusts the contrast of the selected channels automatically.

methods.name: adjustCurves

parameters.name: curveShape
parameters.description: The curve points. The number of points must be between 2 and 14.

methods.description: Adjusts the tonal range of the selected channel using up to fourteen points.

parameters.name: brightness
parameters.description: The brightness amount. Range: -100 to 100.

parameters.name: contrast
parameters.description: The contrast amount. Range: -100 to 100.

methods.name: adjustColorBalance

parameters.name: shadows
parameters.description: The adjustments for the shadows. The array must include three values (in the range -100 to 100), which represent cyan or red, magenta or green, and yellow or blue, when the document mode is CMYK or RGB.

parameters.name: midtones
parameters.description: The adjustments for the midtones. The array must include three values (in the range -100 to 100), which represent cyan or red, magenta or green, and yellow or blue, when the document mode is CMYK or RGB.

parameters.name: highlights
parameters.description: The adjustments for the highlights. The array must include three values (in the range -100 to 100), which represent cyan or red, magenta or green, and yellow or blue, when the document mode is CMYK or RGB.

parameters.name: preserveLuminosity
parameters.description: If true, luminosity is preserved.

methods.description: Adjusts the color balance of the layer's component channels.

methods.name: desaturate
methods.description: Converts a color image to a grayscale image in the current color mode by assigning equal values of each component color to each pixel.

parameters.name: selectionMethod
parameters.description: Modifies the amount of a process color in a specified primary color without affecting the other primary colors.

parameters.name: reds
parameters.description: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: yellows
parameters.description: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: greens
parameters.description: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: cyans
parameters.description: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: blues
parameters.description: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: magentas
parameters.description: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: whites
parameters.description: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: neutrals
parameters.description: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: blacks
parameters.description: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

methods.name: mixChannels

parameters.name: outputChannels
parameters.description: A list of channel specifications. For each component channel that the document has, you must specify a list of adjustment values followed by a 'constant' value.

parameters.name: monochrome
parameters.description: If true, uses monochrome mixing. Note: If this is true, you can only specify one channel value.

methods.description: Modifies a targeted (output) color channel using a mix of the existing color channels in the image. (output channels = An array of channel specifications. For each component channel, specify a list of adjustment values (-200 to 200) followed by a 'constant' value (-200 to 200).) When monochrome = true, the maximum number of channel value specifications is 1. Valid only when 'document mode' = RGB or CMYK. RGB arrays must include four doubles. CMYK arrays must include five doubles.

methods.name: invert
methods.description: Inverts the colors in the layer by converting the brightness value of each pixel in the channels to the inverse value on the 256-step color-values scale.

methods.name: equalize
methods.description: Redistributes the brightness values of pixels in an image to more evenly represent the entire range of brightness levels within the image.

methods.name: threshold

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The threshold level.

methods.description: Converts grayscale or color images to high-contrast, B/W images by converting pixels lighter than the specified threshold to white and pixels darker than the threshold to black.

methods.name: posterize

parameters.name: levels
parameters.description: The tonal levels. Range: 2 to 255.

methods.description: Specifies the number of tonal levels for each channel and then maps pixels to the closest matching level.

methods.name: photoFilter

parameters.name: fillColor
parameters.description: The color to use for the fill.

parameters.name: density
parameters.description: The density (as a percentage) of the filter effect. Range: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: preserveLuminosity
parameters.description: If true, luminosity is preserved.

methods.description: Adjusts the layer's color balance and temperature as if a color filter had been applied.

methods.name: shadowHighlight

parameters.name: shadowAmount
parameters.description: The shadow amount, as a percentage. Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: shadowWidth
parameters.description: The shadow width, as a percentage. Range: 0 to 100 for tonal width (0 = narrow), (100 = broad).

parameters.name: shadowRaduis
parameters.description: The shadow radius (in pixels). Range: 0 to 2500.

parameters.name: highlightAmount
parameters.description: The highlight amount, as a percentage. Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: highlightWidth
parameters.description: The highlight width. Range: 0 to 100 for tonal width (0 = narrow), (100 = broad).

parameters.name: highlightRaduis
parameters.description: The highlight radius (in pixels). Range: 0 to 2500.

parameters.name: colorCorrection
parameters.description: The amount to adjust the colors in the changed portion of the image. Range: -100 to 100.

parameters.name: midtoneContrast
parameters.description: The amount of midtone contrast. Range: -100 to 100.

parameters.name: blackClip
parameters.description: Fractions of whites to be clipped. Range: 0.000 to 50.000.

parameters.name: whiteClip
parameters.description: Fractions of blacks to be clipped. Range: 0.000 to 50.000.

methods.description: Adjusts the range of tones in the shadows and highlights.

description: An object within a document that contains the visual elements of the image (equivalent to a layer in the Adobe Photoshop application).
